details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ اتمم لـنا نورنا واغفر لـنا‌ ۚانك علٰى كل شىء قدير‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اَتۡمِمۡ لَـنَا نُوۡرَنَا وَاغۡفِرۡ لَـنَا‌ ۚاِنَّكَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ قَدِيۡرٌ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbana atmim lana nurana waighfir lana innaka 'ala kulli shay-in qadir
details.translations: Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent.
